"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53cb282d63687232bd590000#post_53cb282d63687232bd590000
Humans do use 100% of our brains. Its just that not all of our brains are used for thinking, but also for silly little things like regulating your breathing, balance, memory, interpreting sensory inputs and so on.
